comments.author: Trevor Higgins
comments.comment: I dont think we need this in two places, IMO the original was better - this class is the validation step for the CaptureAdditionalTimeWidget. The javadoc you added really belongs only on validateStep, as it owns *what* validations actually run. The class level should just describe the class purpose, not how it does it, in my opinion.
